title: Handcrafted Chai Spice Mix
directions: Blend all ingredients together in a small bowl or use a mortar and pestle.
Store the mixture in a sealed spice jar. Use in recipes that call for a ‘masala chai’ blend.
Makes a lovely handcrafted gift for the Foodie in your life.
ingredients: 2 tsp ground ginger ***omit if you plan to use fresh ginger in your recipes
